title: Runner-up at World Cup tournaments by country 1930 to 2014
summary: This statistic shows the number of titles from latin america and the caribbean participating in the 2018 PyeongChang winter games , sorted by country . Out of a total of 37 athletes from this region , 9 were from brazil and 7 from chile .
gold: The statistic depicts the number of vice-championships at soccer World Cups since 1930 by country . Germany has been runners-up four times .
